They are nice leather, look expensive, fit well.  These boots are just what I expected.
Perfect for dancing for hours.  Don't want to take them off.
I sent these back immediately...they look like some kind of plastic instead of leather.  Not a good faux leather.

I really love these boots.  I bought them last winter and everywhere I went people were asking where I got them.  I've seen nothing like them in stores, although they are the quality and style of real Uggs.  I have a few pair of Uggs that have lasted several years, and so far these boots still look like brand new.
This is neat!  It is made of thick "rubbery" black rubber.  Fits right on the console.  Dog's can stomp all over it!
Very cute on my Malinois' collar.
This is great on my Malinois' collar.  Very strong Velcro backing.

Another 5 stars for Shaun T.  I'm a little tired of Insanity and decided to try something new.  How about dancing?  This is really fun and doesn't feel like a workout, except for in your muscles.  Buy it!

These are so cute!  They are a little more flexible than the one that came on my Vivofit, but I like that better.  Also, they don't have the little piece that covers the closure so I use the purple one from my original Vivofit.  I would not trust the band to stay on without it.

I would have sent it back but my husband didn't want the hassle.  I measured his monitor he has so he could get another the same size.  It was 23" across the top.  This one is 23" from left bottom to right top.  Quite a difference.
I've used this before (with lots of working out) and works perfectly.

I have two Malinois.  As they are supposed to be military working dogs, I ordered these dog tags for them instead of cutesy bone-shaped ones.  They really hold up well.  I've had to get extra silencers, as the rubber doesn't last that long.

This is the canned food I usually order when friends are out of cat food (emergency) in another state.  It arrives on their doorstep, and they are so relieved and happy to find it.  Good price and free shipping is great and so helpful.
I usually order this for people on Facebook who need cat food in an emergency.  It is shipped quickly and they are so relieved and happy to find it on their front porch for their hungry fur babies.

I ordered this coat because my other coats are too nice to wear outside, i.e. to the dog park.  This coat is perfect for outdoor activities, as it is really comfortable, washable, and absolutely WARM.  It has nice faux fur inside, the hood is lined with warm knitted fabric.  The sleeves are lined with a type of quilted material and have a knitted cuff. I am a size S and here I ordered an XXL.  In reading the reviews on these coats from China, I believe the size you order is best chosen by crossing your fingers while you check the size box.  I'm 5'2", weigh about 120 and the XXL is perfect, it fits as in the picture.  The fur around the (non-detachable) hood is good enough for doll clothes...I ordered a new fur trim to put on mine.  The coat is now perfect.  I hope it lasts a long time.  I gave this jacket five stars because I would have paid at least $100 for this at the mall.  It fits nicely in the closet with my other really cute coats.
Kind of boring.
So cute on my Malinois collar.  Good product, great Velcro.

My Himalayan had problems every six months, went to the vet and took antibiotics.  Now, I sprinkle this on his food, he eats it, we're good to go.  If I stop using it for some reason, we go back to the same problems.
This is a nice case, has a nice feel to it, kind of non-slip.  It also has some sort of magnet to keep it shut tight when not in use.

Still learning how to use this.  You have to download instructions and get on your computer to set up and find how to use this.  And, it's not as easy as the instructions for a Walmart $7.00 digital watch.  I'm finding it very difficult.Figured out how to use it but it still doesn't sync to my computer.  The band is working every day, but I cannot check my progress at all some days.  Today, I have pulled the stick out of my computer and replaced, refreshed the page, re-synced several times...it still shows up to Sunday.  Nothing for Monday, today is Tuesday at noon and I haven't moved yet?  Sending it back.
Doesn't leak, but I don't leave water in it for long.  And, we've only used it a few times.
This is really fun to play with.  I've had to ask her something twice.  Other than that, she's always spot on!  When I show her off to my husband or friends, everyone wants one.
Some people were complaining about this collar hurting their dog.  I suggest you watch the video first.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G8p5OiZfRj8
Nice quality, looks great on my dog's Jeep.
I have a Malinois and this sort of military look matches him.  This is one tough collar, and the clasp is metal.  Great product!

This is a great leash, no matter how you use it.  Has really nice leather (feels like my horse's reins), I believe it's latigo leather.  It's soft enough in my hands that I don't wear gloves when walking these large brats.  I have other Lavien leashes as well, and they are all great quality.
Waste of money.  The author writes down what he's eating, which is practically nothing.  Go for the Shred...lots of food and snacks and it works.
Just perfect!  Came just like the photo in the ad and has nice heavy magnetic strips.  I'd add a photo, but like I said...
Great product!  I just organized my closet (a room, actually) and these are perfect for leggings, and with a little imagination for other items such as winter scarves.

I like this, however, it is used more than the others that I purchased for holidays.  The last time I replaced it for Memorial Day, I noticed that the weather has not been kind to it.  It has bumps all over it, like some kind of paper that has gotten wet.
This one's good.  The other keychain I got (pink with logo) scratched all over before a week was up.  This one is great, five weeks later.

I'm the one on the Shred diet, my husband is the great chef here.  He looked through the cookbook and was like, "Hey, this one looks good.  Look at this..."  I fixed a meal last night from the cookbook and it was a hit.
This one has held up well, but it's only used for a few days at a time.

I received this within a few days of ordering it.  I loved it when I opened the box.  It looked great with my keys on it.  The problem is, with the keys and all, it was totally scratched up within a week.  Even the white Jeep emblem is all scratched up.  Now, it's not so cute.
I ordered this by mistake because I had one I couldn't find, then found it.  However, this one works much better than the original one I had.  Certainly worth the money.
This is perfect in my kitchen for using the recipe videos of Chef John or Allrecipes.  Hit pause, cut, stir, hit play.
A good book if you like a little mystery, history and Royal Lipizzan Stallions.
Dog doesn't want to wear them but he's learning that they go with a Jeep ride.
Good book but....it was mostly stories not related to my husband.
These pajamas are wonderful.  They are well made and of great quality.  I just don't see paying over $35 for a pair of pajamas.
I have three or four pair of these pajamas and they are well made, one pair has lasted me through several summers.  However, I'm not so sure pajamas are worth $55 per pair.

This is great if you have no idea what you're doing in regard to eating and working out.  I have the Insanity DVDs and have read Eat This, Not That and I found the 21 Day Fix DVD to be just another workout DVD, and the food containers a little silly.  I ended up packing my food into the little containers, then dumping the food on my plate.  I had to wash little food containers about three times a day.  The containers are small, however, when you dump the rice or veggies on a plate it's not less than a normal portion.  There is not much information on what you are supposed to be eating, you have to figure out your meals yourself.  I don't have time for that either.  There is a list of food to put in the green, red, purple, etc. containers, and you can have a certain amount of each per day.  Keep a chart, I guess.
It took fffooooorrrrreeevvvveeeerrrr to arrive, but it's great.  Looks exactly like the picture.  I'm going to order another for a different jacket and that will be for next year.

One of my book clubs read The Girl in the Spider's Web this month and I just did not have time to read all of the book so I picked up this companion so that I could at least take part in the discussion. I am very glad that I did as the author has summarised the book in great details and provided an in-depth analysis of every point of the book. I probably got far more out of this than if I had read the original a couple of times as there are a number of underlying themes that I would not have picked up on. The section on discussion topics was very useful for the actual meeting as it gave us extra points to talk about that no one else had thought of.Overall a well written and well-presented​ companion to A Girl in the Spider's Web.

Pretty Girls was an excellent book and when I saw this companion book I decided to pick it up for another viewpoint on the book. This is an excellent companion to the original and really enhances the experience with an in depth and detailed analysis on the entire book. The author has obviously read the original multiple times and gone through it thoroughly as the pointed out a number of things that I had missed and explained every aspect of the book in detail.Overall a brilliant companion that any fan of Pretty Girls will enjoy.

Behind Closed Doors is an excellent book and a very powerful story. It is very well written with brilliantly crafted characters that are very real and feel very alive. The book shows the effects abuse can have on the lives of different people and how it does not affect everyone in the same way but it always has an effect. I like however that the author has shown that people can overcome it and grow strong in spite of it.Overall an excellent story that is well written and grips you from the very beginning. Highly recommended.

Big Magic by Elizabeth Gilbert is a fantastic book but it is also a pretty big book. This summary does an excellent job of taking all the important information from the book and the lessons that can be learnt analysing it and providing it in a smaller and easier to read format. This is great for referring back to when you do not want to read through the original and can even be read without reading the original as I actually took far more in from this summary than the original book. Well written and well laid out​. Highly recommended.

Night Shitf is a very funny and entertaining look at life on the night shift in a hospital. The book genuinely made me laugh a lot and was a great read from start to finish. I will probably never look at a hospital the same way again, they have always seemed like very somber places to me but this book shows it from the perspective of the staff and in a while new light.Overall this is a fun and entertaining book that is very hard to put down. Highly recommended.

Last Call is not something I would usually pick up but a friend recommended it to me. I am glad that I did as what I got was a unique book unlike anything I have read before that I could not put down and actually finished in just one sitting. This is a brillinatly written story that is relateable to anyone. This book provides more of a journey than a story as you really do feel apart of it. The author has done a brilliant​ job of really bringing this book alive on the page and making it real. Highly recommended.

My wife read this book first and recommended it to me. Even though it is aimed at women I really enjoyed the book and found it to be very well written with great humour and genuinely empowering advice. Me and my wife both love to write and have both experienced those times when you really want to put pen to paper but when you do you have nothing. Your mind goes blank and all those brilliant ideas you had are gone. The author has an excellent outlook on life that resonates strongly throughout this book and even though I have not had any kind of writers block for a while I still found myself writing more since reading it and enjoying the experience more and I found I could pull from more aspects of my life than I realised.Overall an excellent book that is well written, well presented and enjoyable to read. Highly recommended.

I have been looking into investing some of my saving for a while now as I would like to retire one day and my pension alone simply will not cut it. I have looked at a few overviews of the different options available and wanted a more in-depth look at Dividend Investing so I picked up this book. The book is very well written and written in a way that anyone can understand without Jargon or unnecessary filler. The author gets to the point and explains what Dividend Investing is, the pros and cons, how you can make them work for you and more including common mistakes to avoid.Overall a brilliant book that I recommend to anyone interested in Dividend Investing.

Harry Watt, Bounty Hunter is a book with a real classic sci-fi feel. I love books like this with an adventure spanning through space on multiple planets. This if done right can offer a dynamic that you cannot find on just one planet and Rob Guy has done it very well. Harry is a brilliantly crafted character who is very easy to relate too and you really want to know his story and what happens next. A great story needs a character you can invest in and Harry Watt is that character.The plot is excellent and action packed with something going on at every turn. I finished the book in one sitting as I could not put it down. Overall an excellent sci-fi that anyone will enjoy. I will definitely​ be looking for more of Rob Guy's work.

We bought this for our Lab who was constantly barking at night. The collar has been fantastic and we saw a reduction in the barking really quickly. After a few weeks of using the collar he has almost completely stopped barking through the night. The collar is really easy to put on and it is adjustable so we are able to put it on him quite comfortably. The collar adjusts itself to your dog so that they do not receive too great a shock or too small a shock that they do not notice. There is also a built-in limiter so that if the dog barks a lot in a small period of time it will stop so as not to cause harm with repeated shocks.Overall this is an excellent product for anyone who needs help to train a dog with problem barking. Well made with plenty of safety protocols in place. Highly recommended.

As my schedule has gotten more hectic recently I have read a number of books on stress reduction and this has been by far the best one. Stephen L Hunter has written a easy to read and understand guide that tells you how to prevent stress and if it does occur how you can reduce it. We all get stressed at times and it is important to manage it well so that we can re focus on what we need to do and simply so that we do not cause ourselves needless worry. The book is well written, well laid out and written in clear and simple language for an easy read. The techniques in the book are simple and everyone should be able to do them easily to stop and prevent stress. highly recommended.

My life has been a little hectic recently with going back to college as a mature student while still working and I have found that I have little time to relax and de-stress. Stephen L Hunter has written an excellent relaxation guide here with a number of different methods that are really simple, easy to follow and most importantly they work. I have found that using the techniques in here has really helped me to relax which has in turn meant I can focus more on what I need to do without stressing about it. Highly recommended.

The Sheikh: The Search for Yaser Abdel Said: Vol. 2 is an excellent book with a varied and very interesting cast of characters. The author obviously has a good understanding of middle eastern politics and has really done his research making the book feel much more real and the story that much more relatable. Although this is a political thriller and categorised as such there are elements of the supernatural throughout the story including body swapping and Private Detective Bernard Piffy's various areas of expertise. There is also quite a large cast of historical figures turing up at different points in the book and each of them has been very well written to the point that although they are technically out of place they fit ver well with the narrative.Overall an excellent book and I am definitely​ going to go back and read the first (I did not realise this was Volume 2) and will look forward to any future releases.

One of my book clubs decided to read Takedown Twenty this month but I have been incredibly busy and did not have time to read the whole book. I was hoping for a quick rundown of the story and key plot points which I got along with so much more. The author has provided a very in-depth and detailed analysis on the entire story including every plot points, theme and character. I genuinely feel like I know more about the story and the characters from this companion than I would ever have gotten from just the original alone. I recommended it to a couple of people at the book club and they agree that it really does enhance the story and gives you are far more in-depth look than you can get in just one read through the book.If you are studying Takedown Twenty, reading for a book club or simply a fan of the original then this book is for​ you. Highly recommended.

Dead Nolte is unlike anything I have read before. It is equally brilliant and mad. This is a very funny and surreal story about Nolte who is very unique (I have no other words that can describe him). The story is entertaining and laugh out loud funny from start to finish. I actually read the book in one sitting as I could not put it down. The story is action packed and does not give you a minutes rest as we are drawn into Nolte's dark and supernatural world. Very well written and a  very enjoyable read. Highly recommended.

My brother got a DWI arrest recently so I picked this book up for some advice on what we can do. The author has done a brilliant job at explaining the process from start to finish along with do and do not information. The information on selecting a good Lawer was very beneficial for us as no one in the family has really had need for any kind of Lawer before never mind one that specialises in DWI cases. An excellent book that really shows how much research the author must have done. Very well written and very informative. Highly recommended.

Bite Size Advice is difficult to categorize and I feel that everyone who reads it will take something different away. The author covers a large variety of topics based around modern life, the current economic climate, technology etc. It is odd to find so many topics in one book but they are all relevant to the modern world and the author has written them in a very informative yet conversational way making it very easy to read. For a book that is largely informative it is a very enjoyable read that really does have something for everyone. Highly recommended.

I had heard good things before the release of this book so when I saw it had been released I picked up a copy. This is an excellent and fast-paced horror. The main part of the story is based 15 years after the actual attack when she decided it is time to take some revenge for the suffering they have caused her. It is odd in a way to be rooting for the killer but you really cannot help it here as gruesome as the deaths are you can't help but feel they deserve it. The ending was brilliant and very hard to see coming making a great finale for the book.Overall an excellent tale of revenge that is very hard to put down. Highly recommended​.

I have always had trouble with acne since being a teenager. This book offers a brilliant and simple solution that has genuinely worked fro both me and my brother. If you struggle with acne then this book is for you.

I have always liked photography but never really did much until recently when I got a DSLR camera. I did not know what most of the settings did and the cameras manual was pretty useless at explaining them. This book has been brilliant at explaining the different types of photography in an easy to understand way. The information on lighting and what different shutter speeds can do really helped me personally to get much better results.Overall an excellent book that explains everything you need to know about digital photography including the technical stuff in a simple and easy to understand way. Highly recommended.

Addiction is a serious problem at any age but it can be even worse for the older generation. One issue we have is that my Grandfather aged 76 does not want to listen to his grandson 1 third his age telling him he needs to drink less. As far as he is concerned he has been drinking all his life and does not need to stop now. This book is full of sound and practical advice that has really helped us to get through to him. His new medication does not go well with any amount of alcohol and thankfully he is starting to cut down. The author has done an excellent job researching and putting together this guide on senior addiction as it is an area that very few people deal with.Overall an excellent book target to a generation of addicts that no one talks about. Highly recommended.

Legends of the Collective is one of the best sci-fi books I have read in a while. The story has multiple characters but each of them is unique making them interesting and relatable in their own way which. As the story unravels there are a number of surprising plot twists as our cast of characters all from different backgrounds come together. The author keeps the story on point throughout as there is plenty going on making the book very hard to put down.Overall a great sci fi book which offers a quick and easy read that you will struggle to put down.

I read Make Me by Lee Child recently not realising that it was part of an ongoing series and quite a late part at that. Although the book was understandable and did not seem to pull too much on any previous books I felt that I did not really get to know the character as well as I would have. This companion has been brilliant and really explains the character and his past in depth along with a great summary and analysis of the book itself. The author also pointed out a number of things that I have missed in the original book. This is a very well written and well put together companion to Make Me that any fan will enjoy and has really made me want to go back and read the previous books due to the character overview far more than the original did.Overall a brilliant companion for fans of the original especially if like me you have not read any of the previous books though I also think long time fans will also gain a lot of insight too.

The End of Lawers is a great guide for anyone looking into Estate planning be it for themselves or even professionally. The book has been well written, well edited and due to the authors years of experience well researched. This really is a do it all guide that can take you through every step of the process from online documents services, to social security and charity donations to handing over the family business. The authors experience and knowledge really show when reading the book as they have covered every eventuality from every angle like only an expert can. Most importantly for me is that the book is in clear and understandable English​ with very little jargon so that everyone can understand it. Highly recommended.

I really enjoyed Sharp Objects when I read it originally and one of my book clubs have been reading it this month. As I have a very hectic schedule currently I have not had chance to read the full book again so I picked this up as Book Sense summaries have always served me well in the past. As usual they have delivered over and above what I needed. There is an in-depth summary of every bit of the story and every character and then an analysis of each including the underlying themes and motivations. I took my Kindle along to my book club with this summary on as it really helped with discussion points and pointed out a fair few things that most of us had missed.Overall a brilliant companion to Sharp Objects that any fan will enjoy.

I work in a very fast moving industry that can be very stressful at times, attend college full time and have children so my life can be very hectic at times. A colleague recommended this book as they were reading it and said it had really helped them to de stress. I decided to pick up a copy for myself and I am so glad that I did. The book is very well written and easy to understand and implement. Most importantly however is that the strategies in the book genuinely work and do so really quickly. It is a great way to de-stress and I have found that it has really helped me to focus more in my studies and at work making them less stressful overall in general. An excellent book that really can help you be more mindful and de stress. Highly recommended.

I have done a few of those online personality tests in the past that you see on facebook just for fun really but recently a friend of mine told me a little of how they worked and it got me interested. I picked up this book for a more in-depth look at how and why they work and what that can mean for me. I was very impressed with the way this book as been written as this is a relatively complicated subject yet the author has broken it down into terms that someone with no prior knowledge like me could easily understand it. I really did identify a lot with what the author described and I can see from previous tests I have taken and my own experiences how accurate it is.Overall a very interesting book that has everything you need to know about INTJ and personality tests in general. Well written in clear and understandable language that anyone can understand.

Fantasy has long been one of my favorite genres and over the last year I have really gotten into Steampunk style books. I love the imagery that comes with these types of stories when you can really picture the city like in Beasts of Tabat. The author has done a brilliant job of bringing the original and in-depth world to life on the page so it feels like you are really there. I was gripped from the very beginning and even though this book is a little longer than what I would usually read in one sitting I could not put it down.The story takes place in the city of Tabat at a time of change as the Duke is supposed to step down after 300 years of rule at the end of this year and allow a democracy to take his place. Teo and Bella are brilliant characters and you really root for them to succeed from the very beginning. Teo is part of a race that is hunted for who they are and Bellas continual victories in the magical gladiator contests haver caused long winters aggravating the powerful people of the city. Overall​ this is an excellent steampunk fantasy and will definately not be the last book I read by Cat Ramb.

The Martian is one of my favorite all time Sci-Fi books and with the movie about to come out soon my book club decided to read it this month. I have been really pushed for time this month and not been able to re-read the who book so I picked up this companion book to refresh my memory. I was really impressed at the quality fo this summary and realised that I had actually missed a bit the first time reading which the author of the summary picked up on. the author has obviously read the original a number of times and paid real attention to every detail to include such an in depth summary.Ovall an excellent companion to The Martian perfect for refreshing your memory or to get an in-depth​ summary for book clubs, reports or just before the movie comes out.

I only read Go Set A Watchman recently after my friend had been bugging me for months to read it. Afterwards when discussing the book with them they seemed to have a much better understanding of the story than I did. I decided that instead of reading the whole book again I would look for a companion book and came across this one. After reading this I really felt I had a much better understanding of the story, the underlying themes and each character and their motivations. The author has paid a great amount of attention to every bit of the original and created a brilliant summary of the book with an in-depth analysis. If you are a fan of the original then you will definitely​ enjoy this companion.

Dating a Hero is the third book I have read by Tirza Schaefer in as many days. As with the previous two I found that once I had started I could not put it down and finished the book in just one sitting. I liked the idea of their relationship starting on a dating site as this is becoming more and more common yet so few authors use it in their books. The characters are great and you genuinely want everything to work out for them as the story takes a few twists and turns that could potentially end their relationship.Overall a fantastic adult book with real substance. Tirza Schaefer is fast becoming onje of my favorite authors and I will definitely​ be keeping an eye out for more of her work.

Birthday Present is the second book I have read by Tirza Schaefer and she really does have a talent for putting two characters that on first glance do not go together and really making them work. Tirza Schaefer is one of very few authors who write adult fiction that has actual depth, character progression and realistic dialogue. This is a genre filled with a lot of trash lately and it is refreshing to find a quality author who can write books with substance for actual adults. Chahna and Hunter are brilliant characters and it is great to see their relationship grow from their meeting in a bar in Germany. It is a whirlwind romance that you cannot help but get caught up in and swept away by. Overall an excellent book that any adult fiction fans will enjoy.

Alvin Slater has a considerable library of books under his belt now and you would think that with over 50 titles to his name at this point and every one of them is excellent. Alvin Slater specialises in providing adult fiction with real plot, character development that is well written and almost impossible to put down. Legal Tender is no different with an interesting and gripping plot that has you hooked from the first page. Although there is a considerable age gap between Ava and Richard she knows what she wants and she is going to get it. A brilliant story that really sheds light on a relationship that many would consider odd or even wrong yet it really does work really well here. Overall an excellent example of Alvin Slaters work that you will struggle to put down.

I love fantasy books and Lana Axe might just be one of my new favorite fantasy authors. At Rivers End has it all with excellent characters, a well written and interesting story with deep lore in an original and beautifully crafted world. River is a brilliant character that it is easy to get behind and you really do root for him throughout. Had I not started the book so late I would have finished it in one sitting as it was almost impossible to put down. I really liked how even though this was not the first story in this world or even with these characters I was not feeling lost at any point and understood what was going on perfectly. That being said this book has left me wanting more and I will be reading the others very soon.Overall an excellent fantasy book that any fan of the genre will enjoy. Highly recommended.

Born To Be Wild is an action packed and exciting book from start to finish. I actually read the whole book in one sitting as once I got a few pages in I couldn't put it down. I really liked how the author has woven quite a bit of humour into the story and how well written each character was especially Carry and Dan who at first appeared a bit incompatible but you see how well the work together very quickly in the story and really root for them throughout. Although the erotic scenes were excellent and very well written I liked how they were not the sole focus of the story and there was a solid plot behind it with plenty going on.Overall an excellent adult book that is very hard to put down once you start. I will definitely be reading more by Tirza Schaefer.

I bought this to read with my daughter as she has always liked stories about mermaids and mermen and this one was a big hit. a very enjoyable and well written story that looks to be the start of a great series. Highly recommended.

A Killer Love Story is the first book I have read by Dennis Browne but I can definitely day it will not be the last. The author has an excellent writing style and what I really liked was how natural the dialogue feels throughout the book. Allison and Samantha are very different yet equally captivating and it is very enjoyable to watch how their relationship grows especially due to their mutual hatred of each other. This leads to a very interesting and complex relationship that grips you from the beginning.The thriller aspect of the story is equally well written as the author manages to keep you guessing without throwing red herrings at you every few seconds. Instead we are treated to a story that unravels slowly leading up to a fantastic ending that I highly doubt anyone will see coming. Overall a solid book that is very hard to put down. I just need to go and read the previous books that I have missed now.

Sci-fi is my favorite genre and has been since I was a child so I am always on the lookout for new series to get stuck into. Rebel lexis looks to be the start of a brilliant series that I am really looking forward to continuing after reading book 1. The author has a brilliant writing style and really knows sci-fi and how to draw you into this dystopian future so that it feels like you are really there. I really enjoy depictions of earth many years into the future when we are more or less gone and this book really shows off how earth can become very alien and different to the world we know now. Jason Bjorn is a great character who is easy to relate to, he wants to get ahead in life like we all do but is he ready for the challenge that awaits him on earth?Overall an excellent example of futuristic sci-fi and a promising start to the series. A very enjoyable read that can be finished in one sitting but will definitely leave you wanting more, here's hoping book 2 won't​ be too far away.

9/11 is a difficult subject for many people and with the anniversary just a few days ago it is fresh in everyone's mind again. I have read a couple of other books by The Holy Ghost Writer so I decided to pick this one up too.  The book tells the events of the day from multiple people points of view including the terrorists and includes some fiction elements such as what happened to them after death. The book is incredibly interesting as we read about the events of the day from each persons perspective and I read it in just one sitting.Overall a great book that details the events of a day that no one will ever forget. Very well written and respectfully written.

I was looking for another thriller to get stuck into when I came across The Boat Man and I liked the idea of the protagonist's partner being a dog in the story. This is the first Dustin Stevens book I have read but it will definitely not be the last. The story is brilliantly written with plenty of suspense, mystery, twists and turns along with enough action to keep you entertained throughout. Detective Reed Mattox is definitely bearing some scars from the death of his partner and it does color his actions in the story as he and his new partner (his K9 unit assigned dog) work to solve the mystery surrounding the bodies piling up in his city. Overall a well written and gripping book that is hard to put down. highly recommended for any thriller​ fans.

I picked this book up as it was in my recommended reads list. I have to say Amazon was spot on with this one as it is an excellent book that really has helped me be more positive and joyful. Like many people my life can be hectic and stressful but the techniques in this book really do help a lot. They are very simple and easy to implement. Most of these I do most of the time but after reading this I am more mindful and try to do each more often. It is easy to lose focus on what we have when we are focussing on what we want and taking a step back to reflect on the good in our lives that we can be grateful for really does help a lot.

Me and a friend were talking about the huge amount of selfies we see online these days and he recommended this book so I picked it up. I found this to be a very researched, well written and thought provoking read. It was a very interesting read and I think most people have seen the effects of modern technology in this manner. As nearly everyone has a smart phone these days and most people take it everywhere we always have a camera at our disposal and this is definitely part of the reason we see so many selfies online. Not everyone who takes a selfie is a narcissist however as so many people do it the signs can be more difficult to spot. The self check included in the book was very interesting and a few of my friends and I tried it out with some surprising results it definitely made us more self-aware.Overall a very interesting and thought​ provoking book. Highly recommended.

All The Light We Cannot See is one of my favorite books. My book club read it recently but it has been a while since I read the original and I have not had time to read it again to I picked up this companion book. The author has done a brilliant job of including all the key aspects of the story and characters and offering and in-depth look each and every part of the book. this has been one of the best companion books I have come across it is well presented, easy to navigate and has excellent attention to detail even pointing out a number of things I missed initially when reading the book. The book also provided some excellent discussion topics for our book club meeting which everyone really liked and allowed us all to look at things none of us had picked up on.Overall a great companion to All The Light We Cannot See which any fan will enjoy. This is also excellent​ for book clubs to help with discussion and as a study guide for anyone who needs to read the book as part of a course.

Wolf Girl finds necRomance is the first book I have read by Gisele Walko but I will definitely be reading more in the future. I was not really sure what to expect when I started reading the book as I just saw the title while browsing and decided to pick it up. What I got was an excellent supernatural plot with romance, danger and excitement. All of the characters are written brilliantly especially Brennan. I found Brennan to be a very believable character which made her very easy to relate to and made me really invest in the story within just a few pages.Overall an excellent story with plenty to keep you interested and not a dull moment. If I had not started reading the book so late initially I would have probably finished​ it in just one sitting.

I have heard a lot about the benefits of juicing for weight loss and overall health in the past but never really looked into it. I have been wanting to lose some weight so I decided to pick up this book as it promised a guide on how to juice with do's and dont's as well as lots of recipes. I am so glad that I picked this one up as it delivers exactly what it promises. This book really does contain everything yet need to know about juicing from nutritional information and what to buy to the common mistakes and how to get started. The book then has a great selection of recipes to suit every taste. I have tried a little over half of them so far and I have loved every one.If you have not juiced before and want to get started this is the book for you. This really is a one stop shop for everything you need to know to get started, lots of recipes and great information on keeping it going long term and maintaining your weight once you get there.

A Twin's Redemption is an excellent story told to us from the viewpoint of 2 four-year-old twins. The twins have a unique telepathic ability and are very intelligent for their age. Although a book from the point of view of characters so young can sound odd their level of intelligence makes it very easy to understand what is going on yet their age gives everything a very surreal touch. This is a brilliantly crafted story that is unlike anything I have read before. The Twin's are unloved and neglected by their parents but after reading a book labeled Do Not Read they go on an adventure.Overall a brilliant book that had me hooked immediately. I finished the book in one sitting however there are very obvious break points in the story if you wish to read a bit at a time without putting it down in the middle of something.

The Martian was in my opinion one of the best sci-fi books ever written. I recently read the book again and found that I had a completely different take on parts of the story than the first time around so I picked up this companion for an in-depth analysis to see if there was anything else I was missing. This summary and analysis has been very well written and the author has gone through the original book meticulously covering every part and every character in detail. I really liked the character analysis parts as this was where I found I had not picked up on quite a bit, but the author has studied them carefully and gives an excellent analysis.Overall a great companion to The Martian that any fan will enjoy.

The Cost of Crude is the frist book I have read by Inge-Lise Goss, but I will definitely be reading more. The characters especially Gwynn are brilliantly crafted, believable and relatable. The story is fast paced with plenty of twists and turns to keep you guessing until the end. After the death of her friend which may or may not have been an accident she is pulled into an investigation to find out what really happened. The story really does not give you a minutes rest and I read the book in one sitting as I could not put it down.Overall an excellent thriller with an excellent plot and great characters.

Friction was an excellent book and when I saw this companion book I decided to pick it up to delve a bit deeper into the story. The book is very well written and covers the entire book and all of its characters. The author has looked into the original in depth and written a brilliant analysis with a lot of insights that I had missed. The author has also laid out all the underlying themes and motives very well. This is great for anyone reading friction for a book club as it provides plenty of talking points.Overall an excellent companion to Friction that any fan will enjoy.

I love reading inspirational and motivational quotes. I like to at least read one new one each day. I do not mean the horrible ones with a vague background and an Instagram filter on Facebook however. I mean quotes like "Things should be made as simple as possible, but not any simpler." by Albert Einstein which has always been one of my favorites. This book contains similar quotes from many of the most important and most influential figures throughout history. This is a great book not just for the interesting read but it is also a great resource for writing speeches, articles and basically anytime you want to inspire, influence or motivate people.

I have always known that I am an introvert but it is something that I have never really looked into or considered in any way. That has just always been the way I am and I have always just accepted it. I saw this book and I decided to give it a go as it seemed like an interesting read. I am glad that I did as the book really explains a lot about being and introvert and I really identified with a lot of the points mad. Being an introvert can be very looked down upon by more outgoing people but this book really explains all the upsides and advantages of being an introvert has.Overall an interesting read with some great points. Introverts will relate to this book a lot and extroverts may learn something about the other type of people which​ whom they will not interact as often.

I read a lot both fiction and non-fiction. along with loads of articles online and often find that I have more bookmarked and put aside than I have time to read. usually I have just prioritised them and because of this there are a lot of things that I never get around to. This book is brilliant and has a number of different methods so there is something that will work for everyone inside. I found that a couple of the methods did not work for me but work for my partner and vice versa so I recommend trying them all out to find which suits you best.Overall a great book that will save you time and most importantly help you read more.

I have had a smoothie maker for a while now but I have never really used it because everytime I tried the results were not too good. I decided to pick up this recipe book so I could make some nice smoothies. The recipes in this book have been delicious and very easy to follow. I felt like I had wasted money on the smoothie maker for ages but now that I have a book of great recipes I am getting use out of it daily.Overall a great recipe book with loads of great recipes with something for everyone.

I play a lot of Scrabble-like games and I enjoy expanding my vocabulary both for these games and for everyday life. I picked this up thinking there would be at least a couple of words I had never heard of or did not really know the meaning of. Of course you can get this from a dictionary but the author here has collected together just 500 interesting ones so that you do not have to wade through the mundane to learn some new ones. I was actually pleasantly surprised at how much I actually took away from this book as there were a number of words that I had literally never seen before with interesting and sometimes a little obscure meanings.Overall a very interesting book that is kind of like the dictionary if you take out all the boring words and just keep the interesting or unusual ones. An enjoyable read for anyone and great for adding some extra words to your Scrabble arsenal.

I picked this up as in previous years I have had similar books that I can read one Affirmation from each day. I have read through this one and as with others I read 1 each day. What I really like about this one is that it is categorised so I can pick a category that feels most appropriate on that day such as the Achieve Success category before work and read one of the affirmations there to start my day. I have always liked books like this as it is a great way to start your day with some positive reinforcement which you can then take forward and put into action throughout the day. It can be a great boost that can help you get through and make the most of every situation every day.Overall a great book that will give you a different affirmation each day for a year. If you have never tried a book like this before I highly recommend giving it a try and just reading one affirmation each day and keeping it in mind as you go about your business.

Myself, both my brothers and my son play a ton of Minecraft so I picked this up to read through with my son. We both really enjoyed this book and have read it multiple times since purchase as it has become on of his favorite books for bedtime. It is always difficult to get him off to computer and reading a book but as this one merges the two he was more than happy to read it the first time and it has since made him more willing to read more books.Overall if you children like Minecraft then this is the perfect book to get them interested in reading. A very well written and enjoyable story that combines reading with all the elements of Minecraft children know and love.

To Kill a Mockingbird is one of those books that everyone has heard of and pretty much everyone will read at some point in their life. It is an excellent book and truly deserves its status. As with most books that I really enjoy I picked up a companion book for To Kill a Mockingbird for a more in-depth look at the story. This companions is very well written and as promised really does enhance your experience and understanding of the original book. I really liked the section on the characters of the story as the author of this companion has really delved deep into what motivated and drives them for a very interesting analysis.Overall if you are a fan of To Kill A Mockingbird then this companion book is for you. A brilliant companion and a welcome addition to anyone's Kindle library.

Living Legacy is a mixture of both romance and zombie fiction which can sound odd but the author has done a brilliant job in merging the 2 very different genres together. The idea of the water being the cause of the infections spread is brilliant and terrifying as it is vital to life and we cannot avoid it. The characters are brilliantly crafted and very believable in the way they react to their rapidly changing world.Overall an unusual concept that works brilliantly. Very well written with plenty of action and very hard to put down.

The Colony is an excellent sci-fi book which offers an action packed and believable vision of the future. The action scenes are smartly staged and really come alive on the page. The characters are brilliantly crafted and relatable. Pace Warner was my favorite as he has a kind of vigilante hero vibe about him but with a more grounded approach than superhero books. The plot is very fast moving from pretty early on and I actually finished the book in 1 sitting as I could not put it down.Overall a brilliant and creative sci-fi book. I will definitely​ be on the lookout for more by Fred Coulton.

8th Round is a brilliant mix of time travel and zombie/post-apocalyptic fiction. The main protagonist Jacob is brilliantly crafted and very relatable. He has amazing power which has allowed him to experience 7 lifetimes so far now in his 8th round he plans to make a difference and change the dark future that only he knows about. This book is mainly setting up the series and lets us get to know the characters and at least some of their motivations. There are a number of twists and turns and at the end of the book the are still questions to be answered likely meaning we will have more twists to come in later books.Overall a great start to what looks to be a brilliant series. I will definitely​ be on the lookout for the next book.

For an inexpensive mass marketed type of perfume, this is a really nice fragrance. The vanilla is more of a top note than the rose, making this more of a gourmand vs floral for me, which I love and prefer. It's not too heavy, and while the scent lingers, it's not overwhelming. It does have a great dry down, hinting at a warmth without losing the sweet.It's fairly long lasting, and a great benefit to the mass market nature of a Revlon scent is that its really geared towards a bigger crowd, meaning that I haven't gotten any complaints about this scent at work, or with my family.Add on the beautiful bottle, amazing price, all in all to my surprise, this is a wonderful addition to my fragrance arsenal.Love is on, and I love putting it on!

While not a bad sunscreen face lotion, this is not my favorite. The texture is nice, it's thick but doesn't pull on the skin when spreading. It's got a nice citrus scent, and does a nice job of making my skin feel moisturized. However, it doesn't work well underneath my makeup, it gives my foundation the problem of early oxidation, and after about an hour my skin looks shiny. And while I have used it alone, it still feels slick in about an hours time.I love the pump dispenser, and the price per ounce is a value. But, it hasn't given my skin the promised boost of brightening, and is only okay on it's own. So while I will finish this, I won't be repurchasing.

This is a fresh smelling, clean rinsing, nice and foaming face wash. My skin felt clean, but not tight or dry. It didn't feel like it had a residue either. I paired it with the matching vichy purete thermale toner and it left my skin completely clean of make up.It didn't irritate my eye area, and removed my eye makeup without difficulty.This is a very nice staple cleanser.

I drink a lot of coffee, and have a quite the travel and regular mug collection to contain and consume it all. This was a thoughtful gift from a student, and I adore it. For being double wall ceramic it's much lighter than other ceramic travel mugs I have, most likely because of the higher quality porcelain that Lenox is known for.My coffee stays hot longer than my regular ceramic mug, and about the same length of time in my Tervis. Being double walled ceramic there is a small hole on the bottom, I rarely have drips of condensed water, but when I have had it's small, and evaporates or wipes up quickly with a tissue. Hardly a deal breaker, and with hand washing I have not had any dripping problems.The design is beautifully fired onto the mug, very soothing with the blue and butterfly, but I really like the tiny little bee.The lid fits snugly, and I haven't had any lid popping off mishaps.The only negative to this beautiful, and well priced heirloom quality travel mug, is that while it says 12 oz, it's really more like 10.

Arrived well packaged, not a single leaking bottle. The price was fantastic for the set of 18, and the colors were a perfect compliment to my set of promoab1.The acrylic paint itself is as I expected, rich hues, great coverage, fast drying and smooth.Great all around!

This acrylic sealer goes on smoothly, isn't thick, and dries really quickly. I use it over paintings on rocks, and they hold up to getting wet and inclement weather very nicely.It's a great price for an excellent product!

I love the design of the Lenox Christmas tree plate. it's both classic and contemporary, without being overly festive or cartoonish. It's microwave and dishwasher safe, which is perfect for me. The description says this is a porcelain design, though the bottom of the plate printing doesn't mention it. They are very light weight, so a stack of them isn't too taxing to take out and use. It really is a beautiful holiday dinnerware look that I enjoy using.

First off this is made with the most cuddly and super soft material. It's like touching a cloud, it's thick and fluffy and the tactile part of me loves just touching it. Even without the heat element, it's a nice weight and feel for just using as a wrap/lap blanket. I use this typically at my desk wrapped shawl like around my shoulders. There is (ha, was) a huge satin tag that telling me which way is up, and other warnings, right smack dab in the most inconvenient of places, so I took my seam ripper and very gently removed it, no more irritating tag. (I did note which way is up in a tiny arrow with sharpie, because well, I can.)Yes it has those wire feeling heating 'coils' inside, but they don't bother me, especially since they keep me so comfy and warm. This has been an excellent, and much better alternative for me, then running a space heater.The size is generous without being too big or too small. The cord is long enough that I don't worry about it being in the way. My only downside to this wrap? The price tag. It seemed pretty expensive for a not even full size 'blanket.' Even I balked about it before realizing this solid justification: my office mate paid about the same price for an unheated shawl, and because it's outerwear not blink. She keeps it at her desk, does the same with it as I do, puts it on to keep off the chill, and rarely takes it outside the office, yet uses this while running a space heater. My Serta cuddler does the job of both her things, with less annoyance to other office dwellers who don't mind the temperature (or the green energy team who checks the office efficiency) with less energy usage and comfortable warmth by a low wattage plug in. Suddenly, the price is really good for a two in one product.Plus, price aside, it keeps me warm, comfortable and that is worth a lot while I'm working. Excellent heated wrap!

This Gifts of Grace angel musical figurine is beautiful. The "Faith makes all things possible" inscription is subtle, but clearly legible. The weight is great, not too heavy, and very stable on the base.As a gift, this is of heirloom quality. My daughter treasures it. The musical wind up mechanism plays clearly, and it's so lovely to hear, (And it's not too loud.)This is a wonderful Lenox piece!

This Lenox Let it Snow Tree snow globe is beautiful. It's heavy, but not unbalanced. The classic white porcelain with it's golden accents, and simple gift under the tree design is an instant elegance.It's not terribly large, but perfect for a desk, a shelf or a counter. It's eye-catching in its simplicity.While it's beautiful to gift, and priced just right, it's too perfect for me. Love it!

I love Estee Lauder, I love lip balm, I love roses...this should have been a match made in heaven! But, it's just not that good of a lip conditioner. It went on patchy, and wore off uneven. It didn't feel moisturizing, more like it sat on top of my lips and never actually sank in.There are many other, better and less expensive, balms to choose from. This one just didn't live up to my expectations. At all.

I loved my bare minerals perfecting face brush with the bareskin foundation. When they came out with their face complexion rescue foundation, I of course bought it with this brush because it was touted as it's perfect companion brush.It's terrible. It isn't soft, it doesn't leave a smooth finish. I get better results from my fingers, or any other brush. So disappointed. It's now in the drawer just gathering dust.

I've taken public speaking training, many years worth, and though I feel comfortable in front of an audience I just felt after my last public speech I could have done better. That something was missing from my overall performance. And then came this book. It's been a treasure trove of tips, tricks and great information that takes a ho-hum delivery to, at the very least a comfortable wow.I first broached it as a cover to cover reading, but though the information is thorough and easy to understand, it's a lot. I then decided to break it up into what would be an hours weekly session, so some nights not even a chapters worth. I found this to be a very effective way for me to actually learn, retain, and not get frustrated, while going through this book.This has been an effective tool in my goal of being a better presenter. And, not just in a working aspect, but I've found myself engaging my kids more during discussions, even entertaining my mom during our chats. Worth every dollar.

I was really looking forward to this movie. I was raised on Mad Max, and couldn't wait to see a reboot of the franchise. But, this moving failed on so many levels.It was one long chase scene, and our hero Max... not a hero at all. He spent most of his time upside down, literally, in this. While I'm all for strong female leads, and Furiosa was great, the point of a Mad Max movie is... wait for it... Mad Max.So many ways they could have went with this, but didn't. And I'm left irritated that I just watched what is essentially a long, drawn out, ill conceived, chase scene.

This is one of those instances where the actual product is better than in the picture. I liked the bold watch face, but worried that the hands and date would get lost in the black background. This worry was unfounded, not only are the hands/date/hourly markers very reflective, but the face is not a flat black. It picks up light, and even in low light settings I am able to easily see the time. This models styling reminds me of a classic vinyl record, with micro grooves, and is so much more interesting to look at. It is a larger size, but the casing is slim and the weight is light, but not flimsy feeling.Setting the time was simple, and even though the handsome, gifting worthy, packaging came with instructions I found them unnecessary. A half pull of the crown and you can set the date, a full pull of the crown and you set the time.The band did take me a moment. But, once I figured it out, it's easier than the standard leather strap. Instead of always having to find the right hole, you set the sizing and then it's an easy slip on, clip close, clasp. A gentle tug opens the mechanism, and I was pretty happy I didn't have to size any links!The time has held accurately, and when I accidentally left it on while taking a shower I was happy for the water resistant feature! No fog behind the glass, and no worse for wear from the water.Bottom line for me, Lucien Piccard has provided a luxurious watch, at an affordable price. This would make a wonderful gift, that would be well received, (even for yourself!)

This is a fully opaque black jelly in two decent coats, (or for great depth go with three thin!). The multi colored sparkles can be seen in low light, no it doesn't look like just black polish indoors! But, outside is when this polish gets really spectacular.It applied easily, not too thick, no shrinking at the tip that I often get with jelly textures. I applied one coat of clear and it took care of any residual glitter texture.Another great addition to my growing KB Shimmer collection!

This is a swift moving short story, which I really enjoyed because I was entertained and felt a sense of satisfaction when I finished. I found that for being short it still had a really well developed fantasy realm and while I read I remained fully immersed in the landscape.I enjoyed the wild ride through our lead heroines gripping beginnings, (giant creature fighting always works for me!), to her sense of moral right.Nothing too deep, but still really fun. This is a great beach read, or weekend escape. Highly recommend!

This is an adorable addition to my sons toy box. The volume only has two settings, neither of which is too soft or too loud.The songs are cute, and the instruction booklet actually has the lyrics so you can learn them to sing along! i can't think of any other singing toy I've bought that has that, I really liked it because after hearing it enough times I always end up trying to ramble along with the music.The animal sections attach together easily with magnets, but also come apart fairly easily, which is nice for little fingers.He likes sliding the switch to different play/game choices, and it's easy to tap the animals to answers.Fun, functional, and adorable!

Beautiful bamboo meets fantastic functionality. I was tired of plastic utensils, they were melting, breaking down, and ended up looking like my kitchen was full of camping supplies.But, I had a small budget to use, and these fit the bill perfectly. They've held up to scraping, stirring, serving. None have stained, I haven't mucked them up from hot pans. And they haven't hurt the finish of any of my pots.These look great, and work great. I'm so happy with these!

The texture was waxy and thick for the color being so sheer. I picked up 201, thinking it would look moist and natural. It wasn't either of those things, the shade was pale and chalky. I didn't even feel like it added any moisturizing benefits. I would have been better with a rosy lip balm, of which there are several better, less expensive, options.I love the Le Rouge, but the sheer finish A Porter is A Pass.

The game started off with display bugs from the start. Although the beginning animation was interesting, the framing was way off and continued to get worse as the game progressed.Soon the game controls suffered untill the game went to a quarter screen mode and crashed. Only made it to Act One before I couldn't stand the game problems any longer and this is when I uninstalled it. The game is huge in size weighing in at over 500MB, so the time downloading this game was wasted.I am running Android Lollipop; the game should run on it. This game is truly an illusion because it only appears to be a good game but plays as if it were in the alpha (beginning) stages of development where bugs are everywhere. Too bad as the game looked fun, but the horrible controls and crash bugs makes this unplayable. This title was not tested properly.

I was trying to make up my mind between the new Amazon Fire 7-inch tablet and the NeuTab Air7. After going back and forth on the decision for several days, I landed on the side of the NeuTab.First, a little background. We owned an Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7" previously, and disliked the modified Android OS strongly due to having to jump through hoops to get it to play online videos by installing Dolphin browser and Flash Player, needing to installing apps so we could read ePub books, not being able to access the Google Play store, plus an ongoing problem where the tablet would not charge fully and show zero percent, it would occasionally turn off by itself, and other random glitches. All of these reasons pushed us to try Neutab.The NeuTab Air7 is a nice looking tablet that looks more expensive than its bargain basement price. The back is made out of brushed aluminum, which gives it a classy look, and the weight and size of it fits very well in the hand. The quad-core processor makes this tablet very responsive. Opening apps, streaming videos, playing games, and surfing the Internet are quick and snappy with no observable lag.Resolution on the screen is sharp, and details are nice and crisp. Although there are slightly higher resolution tablets out there in this class, you may find it hard to tell the difference. If you are a pixel wonk, this may bother you, but the 1024x600 pixel display is good. And we did compare it next to a higher resolution screen, and the difference is negligible, imho. The camera, both the front and rear, aren't high-end, but for quick snap shots, it'll do the job. Just don't expect iPad quality.Speaking of the screen, we saw an overall greenish/cyan tint over the whole display. This was particularly noticeable when viewing skin tones on movies or looking at photos; the colors weren't true overall. I like photography so color balance is important. However, I was able to fix this issue easily by simply downloading an app from the Google Play store that allows you to add color correction to the display. It worked perfectly and now all the colors are good.Speaking of Google Play, (nice segue, eh?) because this tablet runs on 100% Android and is not adulterated or customized in anyway, this means you get the full Android experience. You can access the huuuuuuge app library at the Google Play Store and get stuff you wouldn't otherwise be able to download if you were running a modified version of Android. This also means you're free of "bloatware," programs, apps and features that you don't really want.The NeuTab Air7 runs on the latest version of Android, which is 5.0, aka Lollipop. I like the new settings interface, and other nice upgrades to it. Operationally, there are a few new things to learn, but if you're comfortable with Android, you'll be fine. You can add additional storage space by flipping open the flap located on the back of the tablet. A nice touch.The NeuTab Air7's volume isn't as loud as I would like, even at the full setting, but if you're just watching videos by yourself, it should be just enough for this purpose. If you want the full sound treatment, just bring out your own set of earphones, plug it in, and you're good to go. For the price, there is a lot of value here. Plus, this tablet has a 1-year warranty, unlike other tablets that only have a short 90-day period. This tablet was for a family member and I set it up for her. As a tech guy, I really like this tablet. And I liked her's so much that I am planning on buying one too.

I've purchased a good number of aquarium heaters over the years and they were all variations of the same function and design, and has virtually remained unchanged for over five decades--a long tube, glass or plastic housing, with heating elements, which were then connected to some sort of thermostat circuitry. My last one, an Aqueon unit, malfunctioned and almost wiped out my whole tank's population because it overheated the aquarium and did not have a safety defeat mechanism. I lost 3 neon tetras, and two nerite snails in this incident and swore, (not verbally), that I would never use tube-type heaters again.Enter the Neo-Therm heater. I was struck by the new, sleek look; very modern and high tech. It wasn't a tube form factor, but was flat, which seems to provide more surface area to be in contact with the water.The LED readout is a great way to check on the water's temperature at a glance, and tells you whether you're up or down in the desired temperature you preset for the unit. One solid LED means your set temp and tank temp are the same. A flashing light before or after your set temp means it is higher or lower. To adjust the temp, you press a button located at the top of the heater, which is a bit difficult to push because it is small, and a bit slippery. But no biggie.Unlike tube type heaters, the numbers on the LED dial actually mean something, whereas, tube style heater numbers don't even correlate to the real temperatures at all, in most cases. All they do is act as a reference point for setting the temperature and this can be extremely inaccurate.I purchased the Neo-Therm and had it up and running in no time at all, not counting the recommended 15-minutes (or more) for the heater to calibrate itself when you first put it into your tank. After this I plugged it in and watched the LED dial display the water temperature. It already has a factory default temperature setting for 78 degrees F., so this makes it very easy to set up.This heater is solid-state, and according to the manufacturer, in the unlikely event that the unit fails, it will simply turn off, and not continue to heat the water. This feature alone makes the purchase worthwhile for me. The accuracy of the Neo-Therm is spot on as I verified the +/- 0.5 Fahrenheit degree accuracy of the unit with a digital thermometer. I was very impressed.The Neo-Therm is sturdy and the outer casing is made from shatter resistant plastic and should hold up for a very long time to bumps and bruises.There were a few issues though. The first unit I ordered was inaccurate to about 1-2 degrees and persisted in this false reading over two week's time. I return this unit, received a new one via Amazon's outstanding customer service, and the replacement unit is flawless.The second one is subjective and doesn't affect the Neo-Therm's functionality, but may be an issue for some. The temperature display numbers, which circle the LED readout from 66 to 96 degrees, are set in multiples of two, or in other words, all even numbers. So if your tank temperature is really 79 degrees F., the display will still show it as either 78 or 80, depending if it decides to round off up or down. So for OCD types, this may be a deal breaker.I've seen the Neo-Therm flash two numbers simultaneously, and perhaps this is the way it tries to show you the in-between numbers, but I only saw this happen once, and it happened with the unit that I returned, so it was probably a fluke. Maybe in the next software update, this could actually be a feature to show the "tweener" numbers.But outside of these two issues, I am very happy with the purchase. Yes, it is more expensive than other aquarium heaters, but if you total the cost of all the heaters you've bought over the years, and have failed or become inaccurate, this makes the Neo-Therm a bargain when you compare the price differentials and performance.

As simulations go for pinball, this isn't too bad. But it's really puzzling why the coders made this game so huge in app size--over 250MB, just for one table? It eats up too much memory, and I found that the graphics of the pinball playing area, while detailed, was just too small and busy to really see what was going on as you played. When you can't really even see the ball's action and where it is at any given moment, what's the point of playing?I have a good-sized 5" screen display on my Android device, and even this larger screen wasn't enough to see everything clearly. I understand that there are a ton of user options to play this pinball game, but the primary goal of any good pinball game is being able to see the entire playing area clearly. In this instance, Pro Pinball Deluxe needs a huge amount of work.Had to delete it because of the sub-par playing experience.

I needed a good basic table vise in order to grip a watch case holder to change the watch battery. I didn't need anything fancy or something expensive that would cost $30 and upwards. As long as a vise was sturdy, reasonably priced, and worked, that would be my ideal. The SE 8436MVC 3" universal table vice may have a pretty pedestrian name, but it delivers in functionality.This vise has a ball joint that allows you to tilt and angle the vise head in any direction you please. I needed a certain angle to apply pressure to the watch case back, and the feature of an adjustable vise head was perfect for what I needed to do. I applied quite a lot of pressure to the case back to unscrew it, and the vise held up well.The only minus to this was that because I was applying force at an angle by twisting, this moved the vise in the same direction and the table clamp slipped a bit. But by positioning the c-clamp against the table edge, this stabilized the unit. Another thing to watch out for is not to unloosen the ball clamp screw too much. I did this and the collar fell off. No biggie as I had to screw it back on, but it's a minor design flaw in the unit that could have been fixed by the manufacturer.The universal table vice has a solid feel to it and hopefully it will hold up over time. It's very handy and I plan to use it on other DIY projects. For under $20, this is a good buy.

Anyone who downloads this game should be aware that it is a humongous resource hog and may not run on devices with less than 2GB of RAM. The game freezes and crashes. It loads and goes through the animation sequences, but starts to lag and stutter, eventually coming to a halt and force closes.But if you can run this game, it might be fun, but the racing may get old, fast.

Stella breathes new life into the Angry Bird franchise by adding a new dimension to the game engine and creating really entertaining game levels. Whether you like these changes is up for grabs.I enjoyed this new approach and had a lot of fun playing it. The bird sound effects are hilarious and it's probably a good idea to turn the sound down if you don't want people to stare at you, lol. The physics are good and finding the right solution in getting a 3-star rating is sometimes challenging, but this is all part of the fun in playing. Nice little game.

After reading the manual on how to set up the display unit and outdoor sensor, the instructions recommended that both units be allowed to equalize or settle down in temperature indoors. I calibrated both units to an accurate digital thermometer. However the requested 30 minute settling time seems to be way too short for the sensors to equalize. It's actually more in the range of 1 hour or more.However, after placing the outdoor unit on a garage door post that was shaded by an eave, the sensor was off by as much as six degrees higher than the digital thermometer. It turns out that outdoor sensor placement is critical in getting an accurate reading because it is very sensitive to ambient heat sources including the wall it is mounted to. This in effect is good and bad news. Good because it is accurate to even slight temperature fluctuations. Bad because it will be inaccurate since it can pick up stray heat from its mounting source.The solution to this is to either hang the sensor from a string or fishing line or hang it from a long nail, but in both cases the sensor should not be touching any surface and should be free standing, if at all possible.But after dialing in the calibration feature for the display, both sensors are spot on in their readings now. The display, as some have pointed out, is very detailed. Some complain that it is too busy, but I like all the info it displays and I feel that this layout is much better than most of the other weather stations that I have seen. It displays the daily high and low historical readings for temperature and humidity, shows the historical data for barometric pressure, shows indoor and outdoor temperatures, current indoor and outdoor humidity, gives a trend indication on whether the temperature is going up or down, and even a "weather forecaster" that gives a guess of weather conditions in the next day or two. And of course, there is the display that visually tells you what comfort zone you are in as it relates to the temperature via different lighted colored backgrounds.I only have my indoor console running on batteries, and the LCD display is crisp and sharp. I don't use the colored back-light much, so I do not need to plug the unit in to use this feature. I can always just tap the "light" button and see the colored display for a few seconds.Setting the unit up was pretty straight forward and not very complicated if you take your time. Some may feel there are too many button presses to change the various setting displays, but the setup is pretty logical. And if you forget what does what, the manual is clear on what you need to do to change the parameters.Once you understand that the outdoor sensor placement is critical to accurate readings, you're golden. Customer support for the WS-11 is excellent and they will help you with any problems on the setup or questions you may have.But one thing should be made clear to any wonks or OCD types out there; this weather station is accurate to within certain parameters and does a very good job of it, and shouldn't be expected to perform with the precision of professional meteorological instruments. If you understand this, this unit is great for what it is was intended for. I like it a lot and refer to it for biking weather conditions in order to dress properly for my daily rides.

This shoulder bag was purchased along with the backpack from Dakine for a family member. And as it was with the backpack, this shoulder bag's biggest problem was with the shoulder strap material. It is very stiff and abrasive, which causes redness and welts on the skin when wearing it. The bag portion is fine, but what good is a shoulder bag if you can't wear it over your shoulder without discomfort and pain?This shoulder bag and the backpack need the straps redesigned so as not to cause so much irritation. This is unfortunate because the color patters on this shoulder bag is very good.

I purchased this backpack for a family member, and she was very happy with the color and design of it. However, after about a week or so of wearing it, it was evident that the shoulder straps were too abrasive and stiff to be worn, and actually caused pain on the shoulder and armpit areas. Although nice looking, it failed miserably on comfort.

This unit has a lot going for it. It has great styling, and an assortment of very good features that any fitness tracker should have. But unfortunately, this is where all the good news stops.
