A wonderful story that will touch your heart. I'm sure many people will be able to relate to this woman's situation.

I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase (along with the Extra Plush Bamboo Fitted Mattress Topper, 2-Inch Thick). I bought the set as a gift for my daughter and surprised her by putting the topper on while she was at work (the foam wasn't arriving until the next day). She felt a great difference with just the topper. When the foam arrived, we put it on together, and she called and raved about how much more comfortable her bed was and how well she slept. I decided that I would buy another set for a queen bed in my guest room. The packaging was incredible. When I opened the foam, there was absolutely NO odor and it laid flat immediately-perfect fit. Very, very satisfied with my purchases.

I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase (along with the Density Visco 4 Pound Elastic Memory Foam Mattress Pad Bed Topper, 2-Inch Thick). I bought the set as a gift for my daughter and surprised her by putting the topper on while she was at work (the foam wasn't arriving until the next day). She felt a great difference with just the topper. When the foam arrived, we put it on together, and she called and raved about how much more comfortable her bed was and how well she slept. I decided that I would buy another set for a queen bed in my guest room. The packaging was incredible. When I opened the foam, there was absolutely NO odor and it laid flat immediately-perfect fit. Very, very satisfied with my purchases.

My little Panasonic Lumix camera broke recently. The "fins" wouldn't open and it wouldn't zoom. I had been carrying it in my purse in a soft case. I'm not absolutely sure but I think this is the reason it broke. It was never dropped or abused so that's why my conclusion is an assumption.I really liked the camera I had so I bought another one. I didn't want the same thing to happen so I purchased this hard shell case. The camera fits like a glove and I feel it is very well protected. I carry accessories in a small zippered plastic bag so I didn't need any extra room. It's a bit bulkier, of course, but I don't mind as long as it keeps my camera safe.

I discovered ProtectAll when we were RVing. Aside from it's obvious uses outside, I used to use it in the shower, sink and on the commode. It kept everything looking brand new. Also great on the galley countertops. I now have a small trailer and in between major waxes I use it inside and out.This product has many uses around the house. Again, the bathrooms sparkle if you use it, after cleaning, on sinks, toilets, etc. I also use it to keep my washing machine and dryer looking brand new. I have actually had people ask me what I use to clean my bathrooms! It's a great glass cleaner though a little expensive to use it as such on windows, but on glass tables nothing does a better job.

I hope that this film brings comfort to the families of soldiers who died serving our country. Hopefully, they are reassured that "their Soldier" is treated with the utmost respect and dignity throughout his journey from battlefield to home. Very moving, especially as this holiday approaches. Kevin Bacon does a wonderful job portraying the escort. Thank you to all who served. "All Gave Some and Some Gave All" This is about those who gave All.

I wanted this camera so that I could always have quality pictures. A friend of mine has the same one, and last week the zoom quit. This week mine quit. Unfortunately, I purchased extra batteries, a charger, so hope I can find another brand that uses the same battery. Very disappointed and would not advise anyone to purchase it. I could understand if it was mishandled at any time or dropped, but it appears to me that it's just poorly made. It does take very nice pictures, but what good is that if it doesn't last.

Acting was superb. I'm not a prude, but I found the F word distracting.  It took away from many scenes.I've worked in the corporate world assisting the highest VPs and it isn't representative of the global corporation I worked for.  I'd love to watch it again just to see how many sentences are spoken without it. Probably would have given it a 4, otherwise. Loved Matthew and Leo's performances (can't spell Matthew's last name.LOL).
True to sizing information. Frame is attractive and matches other frames I ordered. For me, it was a good buy.
Good to have protection for the lens on my camera. I bought two because I have two lenses. Good idea to for anyone to consider protecting their investment.
I wanted to make sure I had an extra cap for my new camera. It protects the lens not only from my own hands, but all the other little hands that come across my camera on the table.

I had a devil of a time finding one of these in a store when I was away on a camping trip. I lost my lens cap and it was a pain in the neck worrying about scratches. I bought several caps and these so that I can replace the one I'm using, if necessary. So far, so good. It's stayed attached and these little holder keeps me from losing it while I'm using the camera.

I discovered a few days before freezing weather that my water pump didn't operate. I had already decided to blow the lines out, but to be on the safe side I didn't feel comfortable without the pink anti-freeze. I bought one of these and within no time the job was done.
This little plug made winterizing a snap. I had never heard of winterizing this way until I saw this handy little item.

The plug on the hot water heat was located in such an awkward place that no matter what I did I couldn't get to it. Came to trusty old Amazon and found this. It was exactly what I needed. The heater is drained AND I have extra plugs and the wrench. Thank goodness. I'm cutting it close with cold weather coming in. I taped the plug inside the compartment (duct tape) so that it's there when I need it and have two extra plugs, the wrench, and the thread tape in a plastic bag so it's all just where I need it.

I like these shirts. Reasonable price. They serve two purposes for me. One as a pajama top; the other as an undershirt for warmth. We're just starting our cooler weather, but layering with comfortable clothes allows me to save on heating and still be comfortable. I haven't turned my heat on, yet, for this year. This morning it was in the 50s. The shirts are soft and comfortable. I have them in White and Ash.I plan to use them as regular shirts while camping when it's a little too cool for short sleeve keys.

I've only had these glasses for about a half hour so I can't speak to durability, yet. They are far better than the ones I had from a local drugstore. The glass is clearer. They are lighter and smaller AND they came with a small hard case that I didn't expect. They fit me perfectly. I use them on my laptop, but can glance up to see the TV since they are half lens size. Glad I made this purchase.

I wasn't quite sure about it when it arrived, but I just took my lab on a two week camping trip with my small trailer. Space is at a premium, but I found that this Bag allowed me many more options as to where I could keep dog food. As it turned out, it freed up space in my trailer and I was able to keep the food in the cab of my truck--it's much easier than finding a place for a hard sided container.  I put a 30 pound bag plus some in it and it was so easy to fold down per the instructions to keep it airtight. Having the handle makes it easier to lift, as well.

Love them because they are fun and I dress almost exclusively in casual clothes. I bought more of the polka dot and  these, and I mix and match them for even more fun. I don't like thick heavy socks unless it's very cold out, but these are the right thickness for my liking. I think they will hold up. Have already washed some and they did well. As far as durability, I don't know how long I can expect at such a good price, but I'll report back if I don't think I got my money's worth.
Nice to buy in bulk and pay less for necessary items. Most people have their preferred product in this area so if this brand is your brand, there's nothing else to say.

I had lumbar back surgery a little over 3 months ago, and I'm now attending aquatic physical therapy. I bought the largest size because I wanted to be able to move freely. It's so lightweight that it feels like I'm wearing nothing and it dries in moments. I have the matching bottoms and love them, as well.

My daughter is a nurse and suggested that I get one. Arrived home yesterday and if I had to choose one item that has afforded me comfort, without question it would be this product (well, second to meds) . I decided to recover on my back by laying on my side for support, this pillow was just the right choice-just what I needed. Nothing skimpy about it! I wish I had known about it before surgery-side sleepers will love it-people with back pain will find it to be essential.

I can't say enough about how much more enjoyable reading is with the Paperwhite. I have a problem with contrast and it solved my problem. I think it's easier to hold and much easier to turn pages. And, I can read no matter where I am because I don't need a light. It's with me all the time. What a difference!I'm a little confused as to whether I was supposed to be reviewing the leather cover or the Paperwhite so I'll tack my review of the cover on, as well. Another five star rating. I can't think of one thing I don't like about it. Again, far superior to the cover I bought for the Kindle.

Cornwell was once one of my favorite authors. Her first decade? of books were page turners. No more. Perhaps her new readers will be as excited about the announcement of one of her new novels as I once was. I think the turning point was when she wrote the "Jack the Ripper" book. I feel as though (not saying it is so) that someone else is writing. Not the Cornwell I once knew. Could be that I've just read to many.
I have snow white hair. This looks the most natural on my brows. Brown looks ridiculous. This lasts long and it's a wide pen so it's easy to put on.

I purchase this for my 11 year old lab who had lymphatic fluid draining into his chest a year and 1/2 ago. I continued giving it to him after a very extensive surgery and I think, in part, it has kept him healthy. I also give him dehydrated sweet potato chips and a prescription low fat dog food. They call him the miracle dog! I was buying from from GMC, but buying at Amazon saves me about $12.00 per bottle, I think. Same brand, same everything.Chylothorax is a condition that results from the accumulation of lymphatic fluid in the chest cavity where the heart and lungs reside (pleural cavity). The main culprit of this condition is chyle, a digestive fluid that is formed in the small intestine and conveyed by the thoracic duct to the veins. En route to the veins, chyle can leak into the chest cavity, accumulating there and causing excessive pressure on the chest and its organs.Chyle is a milky to slightly yellow fluid made up of lymph and fats from the intestines and transferred to the circulation through the thoracic duct (the main trunk of the lymphatic system, which crosses the chest near the spine and empties into the circulation system). Lymph is a watery fluid that is produced by the tissues of the body and which contains white blood cells, which are essential for protecting the body. Lymph travels through the lymphatic vessels, transporting lymphocytes (white cells that function specifically for cellular immunity) and fats from the small intestines to the blood stream. Commonly, when chyle has accumulated in the chest cavity, blockage or obstruction of the lymphatic vessels will occur, causing the vessels to dilate and affecting the tissue that covers the lungs and lines the inner chest cavity. This tissue becomes inflamed and scar tissue forms, narrowing the space and constricting the lungs. Severe breathing problems may result.

Here's a good solution. I have a total of 5 remotes (a couple of small ones) and they all fit. Great not to have to hunt around when I need them, and it doesn't detract from the decor of my family room. Unlike the picture, I don't use it for anything other than remotes which is why I can fit 5 and have room for one more.

I ordered and additional number of glasses as I gave some to my son when he set up housekeeping. I have had them for years, and I really like them. I bought all sizes, but bought more of the large tumbler.

I use this mandoline almost every day. I like it better than a more expensive one that I bought. Be sure to get a kevlar glove as it is easy to slip, and a bad cut can be the result. The food holder is useless, but I like everything else about it. I slice sweet potatoes all the time, to bake, and they are perfect.

For $10 this is definitely a 5 star product. If you're looking for super high quality, you'll be disappointed. It does feel cheap. But it IS cheap. That's the point! I didn't want to buy a fancy overpriced cover for an old tablet that is only used for kids' games. I was very pleased to find a cover that fits correctly and looks nice for such a low price.  :)

These pads are perfect. The filling is quilted in tightly, the outer seams are secure, and they are very absorbent. You won't fling junk all over your house shaking one of these out to unfold it! And it won't fill up with one pee (unless your using it for a big dog!). They work as well as another good quality brand we have been using, but their larger size makes them more flexible. You could probably use these comfortably for up to a 15-20 pound dog. My dog is 15 pounds and has a small shower lined with 4 overlapping pads, but if he had better aim I'm sure I could get away with one.My husband and I are dog trainers and operate a doggie boot camp out of our home. One of the lovely tasks we often have is pad training small breeds. Since this is a helpful lifestyle choice for many people, finding an affordable source for quality pads is important. These pads will definitely be on our list!I received a free product in exchange for my honest review. Most potty pads I have used are terrible. My free bag of 50 pads didn't earn this product 5 stars. The quality of the product did.  :)

I received a free item in exchange for an honest review.First of all, the gloves are manufactured well and feel very sturdy. They resist heat very well, allowing me to hold a hot dish comfortably for more than a few seconds. With my regular oven mitts I have to be quick or the heat seeps through. These allow me to take my time. The reason for only three stars however is that they are thick and inflexible, making my dish feel very unstable in my hands. This is a little scary when handling a hot chicken sitting in a pan of crackling grease at 450 degrees Fahrenheit! They are still a good product, and perhaps it's a stylistic thing - I'm sure many people will love them if they find them comfortable. For me the five-fingered glove feature is not as practical as a mitten-style oven mitt. But if you need fingers for something (nothing too delicate) these may also be a good choice. They just didn't work for me.

What I love most about this is that when you pull the pin the alarm stays with you. My other one is the other way around - the pin stays with you and the alarm separates. That always felt backwards to me, yet it seems most of them are made that way. This alarm is also louder than the first one I bought.I got one of these after being harassed by a group of teenage boys at the park with my kids and then followed to my car. It was a humiliating experience and I felt powerless. It was at a secluded park and no one else was there. I called 911 and a cop came and the boys walked off like nothing happened and the cop thought I was exaggerating. I don't know that they would have done anything, but it was a little scary. I think a little device like this is just enough to ward off opportunistic trouble makers.

I bought the 4T for my nearly-4 year old. She had grown out of the 2T. These were a jump in size, so a little big, but I expected that. There's room to grow. The waist portion is THICK so they look very much like granny panties! The totally cover her belly button. Not that my daughter needs to look amazing in her underwear, but these are a much bulkier fit than Hanes brand. I don't like how they often show over her pants and shorts. She is a lanky girl but with a big baby belly still, so if you're girl is very slim these will be a poor fit. On the other hand, they are holding up better than Hanes with fewer hanging threads and unraveling hem lines.
